sentences.sContent: She lifted the kettle a little and tilted its spout over the tea-pot.
sentences.sCn: 她稍稍提起烧水壶，将壶嘴向茶壶倾斜。

synos.tran: 喷口；水龙卷；水落管；水柱

phrases.pCn: 无可挽回；在典押中；在困难中
下水管；雨落管；水落管；出渣槽

words.tran: 说话滔滔不绝的人；喷油井

trans.tranCn: 喷口；水龙卷；水落管；水柱
trans.tranOther: a sudden strong stream of liquid which comes out of somewhere very fast

trans.tranOther: if liquid or fire spouts from somewhere, it comes out very quickly in a powerful stream
